crew/astrid-alder.html.title: Astrid Alder
crew/astrid-alder.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 1 Rank:: Captain Species:: Human Role:: Commanding Officer
Portrait:: Note:: Sent to the Shackleton Expanse to act as a bridge builder to new peoples and civilizations. She carefully chose her crew for this purpose. Astrid Alder built a reputation in Starfleet as a First Contact specialist. She is a remarkable ability to keep contact open with new civilization and build bridges between them and the Federation.
Now, Captain Alder is assigned to the USS Hudson to form new alliances far away on the far side of the Klingon and Romulan empires, in the Shackleton Expanse. For this mission, she has hand picked members of her crew to handle a wide variety of scientific, military, and diplomatic situations.Value1:: Strength in diversity Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Captain Alder coached Verid Tiaun through a tense negotiation between a Federation colony and a Tzenkethi colony.
Robert H. Lodge is the XO and reports directly to Alder.
Astrid Morgan Statblock

Astrid Alder Log 1.1: Stardate - The Hudson was sent to investigate the disappearance of a Federation scouting vessel near the Bacchus system. Upon our arrival, the ship suffered a total power failure as it was hit by a massive subspace distortion wave. The wave itself is preventing all long-rong communications and warp travel. We're stranded.I've sent an away team down to Bacchus-3, an M-class planet with massive spires reaching into it's upper atmosphere. Scans show it to the the source of the subspace waves. The team has just re-established communication between the Hudson and the planet's surface. It seems the missing scout team is there studying the Spires. They were been able to open one of them and hopefully they've find a solution to our predicament sooner rather than later. Meanwhile, the crew on the Hudson has problems of it's own...

crew/edon-jebrien.html.title: Edon Jebrien
crew/edon-jebrien.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson NumRank:: 4 Rank:: Lieutenant Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Bajoran Role:: Flight Controller
Portrait:: Note:: An outlier in Starfleet far away from home and with a dream of exploring the vast mysteries of the galaxy. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Former classmates and gravity tennis partner with Verid Tiaun.
Was encouraged to sign up to Starfleet by Robert H. Lodge
Career Rivals with Nisha
During a transporter accident, was helped by Fitz to stay patient.
Often speaks to T'Lor about the spiritual aspects of space travel
Relates to Roger Quincy, who also has a religious background.
Edon Jebrien - Statblock

crew/fitz.html.title: Fitz
crew/fitz.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Enlisted NumRank:: 6 Rank:: Senior Chief Petty Officer Species:: Caitian Role:: Transporter Chief
Portrait:: Note:: Old, jaded, and sarcastic. But also a wealth of experience and a reliable crew member. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Somewhat of a Yoda character to Verid Tiaun, giving short, wise advise that always seems to be the right call.
Both Fitz and Robert H. Lodge are enjoyers of craft beer, (a real luxury on a starship!)
Fitz helped Edon Jebrien through a transporter accident, advising patience as the problem got sorted out.

crew/jolepo.html.title: Jolepo
crew/jolepo.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson NumRank:: 3 Rank:: Lt. Commander Type:: Player Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Edosian Role:: Science Officer
Portrait::
Player:: Dan Note:: A xenobiologist with over a century of experience. Several other careers previously. Was a merchant on a starbase. Junior officer in a second career.Value1:: First Contact? Sign me up! Value2:: Every Puzzle has A Solution Value3:: Exploration is the blood that fills my veins. Value4:: There is no greater puzzle to solve than a person's mind.

crew/kyle-miller.html.title: Kyle Miller
crew/kyle-miller.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 7 Rank:: Ensign Species:: Human Role:: Security Specialist
Portrait::
Note:: A simple man from Indianapolis who constantly finds truth in Jolepo wisdom. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Looks up to Jolepo, who seems to always have the perfect nuggest of wisdom for every situation.
Kyle Miller - Statblock

crew/nisha.html.title: Nisha
crew/nisha.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 5 Rank:: Lieutenant JG Species:: Orion Role:: Navigator
Portrait::
Note:: An outlier in Starfleet due to their species and career rival to Edon Jebrien. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
A career rival to Edon Jebrien, with whom she competes for many of the same roles and positions.
Nisha - Statblock

crew/robert-h.-lodge.html.title: Robert  H. Lodge
crew/robert-h.-lodge.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson NumRank:: 2 Rank:: Commander Type:: Player Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Human Role:: Executive Officer
Portrait::
Player:: John Note:: In his first role as XO and looking to prove himself as capable of command. Looking for ways to help around the shipValue1:: The Federation brings unity to chaos. Value2:: Every crewman is a part of the solution. Value3:: Take time to study the problem before rushing to conclusions. Value4:: Knowledge is a weapon use it wisely.
Jolepo is often frustrated with Robert's decision making process.
Both Verid and Robert H. Lodge are in leadership positions for the first time, and helped each other get there.
Encouraged Edon Jebriento sign up to Starfleet.
Both Robert and Roger Quincy have a love of American history.
During a first contact mission, the team lead got sick. Doctor T'Lor mentored Robert through the first contact process.
Both Robert and Fitz share a love of craft beer.

crew/roger-quincy.html.title: Roger Quincy
crew/roger-quincy.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 2 Rank:: Commander Species:: Human Role:: Chief Engineer
Portrait:: Note:: A religious man from Massachusetts with a love of American history. Member of the episcopal protestant denomination.Value1:: If it ain't broke, don't fix it. Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Loves to discuss American history with Robert H. Lodge.
Much like Edon Jebrien, Roger is from a religious household. The two of them have a shared understanding of what it means to be both Starfleet officers and religious servants.

crew/t'lor.html.title: T'Lor
crew/t'lor.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 4 Rank:: Lieutenant Species:: Vulcan Role:: Ship Doctor
Portrait::
Note:: A doctor who previously mentored Robert H. Lodge through a first contact negotiation. She believes in spiritual qualities to space exploration, and was formerly lovers with Jolepo. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Formerly married to Jolepo decades ago.
When the team lead for a first contact mission got sick, T'Lot mentored Robert H. Lodge through the first contact diplomacy process.
Sometimes speaks to Edon Jebrien about the spiritual aspects of space travel.
T'Lor's Statblock

crew/tizia-sh'vollot.html.title: Tizia Sh'vollot
crew/tizia-sh'vollot.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 5 Rank:: Lieutenant JG Species:: Andorian Role:: Junior Science Officer
Portrait:: Note:: Become an astrophysicist to avoid the political life lead by her diplomat parents. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Both Tizia and Verid Tiaun joined Starfleet to avoid a life of politics, like their diplomat parents.

crew/valerie.html.title: Valerie
crew/valerie.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 3 Rank:: Lt Commander Species:: Human Role:: Ship Counsellor
Portrait:: Note:: Years spent living on a space station has prepared her as a ship counsellor for the Hudson's diverse crew. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Shares many similar experiences of living on a space station with Jolepo
Valerie - Statblock

crew/verid-tiaun.html.title: Verid Tiaun
crew/verid-tiaun.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: they/them Location:: USS Hudson NumRank:: 4 Rank:: Lieutenant Type:: Player Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Trill Role:: Ops Manager
Portrait::
Player:: Kelly
Note:: Went into engineering to avoid a diplomatic life, and came up into leadership positions with Robert H. Lodge and Edon Jebrien. Value1:: Space is big enough for all of us Value2:: Protect the ship to protect the crew Value3:: Listen to opposing viewpoints Value4:: Fix tomorrow's problems today
Jolepo is friends with Verid's twin joined sibling. They each know half of the same person. Jolepo and Verid also once helped each other survive a crash landing in an escape pod.
Both Verid and Robert H. Lodge are in leadership positions for the first time, and helped each other get there.
Both Verid and Tizia Sh'vollot have parents who were previously diplomats. They joined Starfleet to get away from a life of politics.
Captain Astrid Alder helped Verid through treaty negotiation "xenkethy" people colony disagreement
Fitz is often a wise mentor "yoda-like" character to Verid
Verid and Edon Jebrienwere classmates in Starfleet Academy. They were Gravity Tennis players together. They work well together because Edon is very familiar wit the way Verid likes to tune engines.

crew/web-hudson.html.description:

sessions/logs/astrid-alder-log-1.1.html.title: Astrid Alder Log 1.1
sessions/logs/astrid-alder-log-1.1.html.description:
Session:: Hudson Session 1.1 - Arrival at Bacchus-3
Character:: Astrid Alder Stardate:: 5428.8Log:: The Hudson was sent to investigate the disappearance of a Federation scouting vessel near the Bacchus system. Upon our arrival, the ship suffered a total power failure as it was hit by a massive subspace distortion wave. The wave itself is preventing all long-rong communications and warp travel. We're stranded.I've sent an away team down to Bacchus-3, an M-class planet with massive spires reaching into it's upper atmosphere. Scans show it to the the source of the subspace waves. The team has just re-established communication between the Hudson and the planet's surface. It seems the missing scout team is there studying the Spires. They were been able to open one of them and hopefully they've find a solution to our predicament sooner rather than later. Meanwhile, the crew on the Hudson has problems of it's own...

sessions/summaries/hudson-session-0.html.title: Hudson Session 0
sessions/summaries/hudson-session-0.html.description: Note:: The crew of the USS Hudson is recruited and prepared for duty (and friendship!)

sessions/summaries/hudson-session-1.1-ar.title: Hudson Session 1.1 - Arrival at Bacchus-3
sessions/summaries/hudson-session-1.1-ar.description:
You can join one of my Mothership one shots for free! This month's One Shot Special is Mothership! A Mothership One Shot *100 years ago, the American Oil and Fuel Corporation bankrupted itself to send a doomed space mission to the planet Mercury. A century later, deep surface scans show an impossible petroleum compound hidden under the crust of Mercury, dubbed "dragobenzine". You have been hired to survey and break ground on a new mining operation that promises to unlock interstellar travel for humanity using this new fuel source. This historic return to the Scorched Planet will also answer a century old mystery: Why did the oil and fuel corp throw everything away to get here, and why did they never return?* Content advisory! Fire, Mutilation, Body Horror, Character Death, Death, Demons, Mind alteration, Self-Harm, Violence, Cults These one shot specials are FREE for any player in an active ongoing campaign. Others can join at the listed price. You can also always invite a friend and give them your referral code and you BOTH get $10 credit on SPG.Stardate:: 5428.8
Mission:: Bacchus-3
Note:: The USS Hudson arrived Bacchus-3, falling victim to a total power failure tripped by a massive subspace distortion. The subspace waves prevent long range communication and warp travel. They were found to be originated on Bacchus-3. An away team was put together to investigate the planet and hopefully deactivate whatever is causing the waves. On the planet, several Federation members were found, studying massive monoliths reaching into the upper atmosphere. The Hudson's away team was able to open a door on the monolith, revealing passageways inside.

headers.heading: Feb 28 @ 10am EST JOIN HERE
March 1 @ 4pm EST JOIN HERE
March 1 @ 8pm EST JOIN HERE

sessions/summaries/hudson-session-1.2-ba.title: Hudson Session 1.2 - Bacchus' Irresistible Call
sessions/summaries/hudson-session-1.2-ba.description: Thing Stardate:: 5428.8 Mission:: Bacchus-3 Note:: The Hudson's away team managed to deactivate the subspace distortion wave using the control room inside one of Bacchus' spires. Meanwhile, a Klingon Bird of Prey, The IKR Ya'Leth, fell out of warp completely deactivated much like the Hudson before.Deactivating the subspace wave triggers a security response, and the machinery in the planet began to rip apart the other planets in the solar system. The Hudson's crew assisted the Ya'Leth to eject their warp core, now resonating with the same subspace distortions as the planet.After escaping the Bacchus system, astronomers watched in horror and amazement as the entire Bacchus-3 system pulled itself apart, pulling inwards towards a singularity, and disappeared.

uss-hudson.html.title: USS Hudson
uss-hudson.html.description:
Summary Location:: Shackleton Expanse
Portrait:: Note:: The NCC-7832: A exploration and diplomatic exchange ship set to explore the Shackleton Expanse.
A Federation Cardenas Class starship commanded by Astrid Alder. Federation Starship Cardenas Class Dependable Workhorse The USS Hudson has been assigned to explore the Shackleton Expanse on the far side of the Klingon and Romulan empires. With hopes of finding much needed allies in the Expanse, Captain Astrid Morgan has selected a diverse crew of people from the Federation and beyond. The USS Hudson will be based out of Narendra Station, a deep space research station jointly run by Starfleet and the Klingon Empire.
Hudson Session 0: Stardate - The crew of the USS Hudson is recruited and prepared for duty (and friendship!)
Hudson Session 1.1 - Arrival at Bacchus-3: Stardate 5428.8
The USS Hudson arrived Bacchus-3, falling victim to a total power failure tripped by a massive subspace distortion. The subspace waves prevent long range communication and warp travel. They were found to be originated on Bacchus-3. An away team was put together to investigate the planet and hopefully deactivate whatever is causing the waves. On the planet, several Federation members were found, studying massive monoliths reaching into the upper atmosphere. The Hudson's away team was able to open a door on the monolith, revealing passageways inside.
Hudson Session 1.2 - Bacchus' Irresistible Call: Stardate 5428.8 The Hudson's away team managed to deactivate the subspace distortion wave using the control room inside one of Bacchus' spires. Meanwhile, a Klingon Bird of Prey, The IKR Ya'Leth, fell out of warp completely deactivated much like the Hudson before.Deactivating the subspace wave triggers a security response, and the machinery in the planet began to rip apart the other planets in the solar system. The Hudson's crew assisted the Ya'Leth to eject their warp core, now resonating with the same subspace distortions as the planet.After escaping the Bacchus system, astronomers watched in horror and amazement as the entire Bacchus-3 system pulled itself apart, pulling inwards towards a singularity, and disappeared. The Hudson is equipped with dozens of shuttles. Some notable ones are listed below!

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the more connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make disconnected parts more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar

info_sourcePath.description: The local path to the source .html file which will be included.

info_allowFoldingLists.description: Whether or not to allow lists to be folded

info_allowFoldingHeadings.description: Whether or not to allow headings to be folded

info_siteUrl.description: The url that this site will be hosted at

info_siteName.description: The name of the vault / exported site

info_authorName.description: The name of the author of the site
